text: Gopal Krishna Gokhale, CIE (9 May 1866 â€“ 19 February 1915) was an Indian liberal political leader and a social reformer during the Indian Independence Movement. Gokhale was a senior leader of the Indian National Congress and the founder of the Servants of India Society.
